languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, вам угодно проинспектировать диспетчерский пост или... отправиться на поиски храма Кровавой паутины?" {n}Последнюю фразу он произносит с явным беспокойством.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, вам угодно проинспектировать диспетчерский пост или.. отправиться на поиски храма Кровавой паутины?" {n}Последнюю фразу он произносит с явным беспокойством.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, вам угодно проинспектировать диспетчерский пост или... отправиться на поиски храма Кровавой паутины?" {n}Последнюю фразу он произносит с явным беспокойством.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room, or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}

{n}Purple veins are bulging on his temples, and the dark circles under his eyes speak to many nights spent on duty. His well-ironed uniform is threadbare in places and covered in old scarlet stains, but that only makes him look more rugged.{/n}
"Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}

{n}Purple veins bulge at his temples, and the dark circles under his eyes speak to many nights spent on duty. His well-ironed uniform is threadbare in places and covered in old scarlet stains, which only adds to his hard appearance.{/n}
"Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}

{n}Purple veins bulge at his temples, and the dark circles under his eyes speak to many nights spent on duty. His well-ironed uniform is threadbare in places and covered in old scarlet stains, which only adds to his hard appearance.{/n} "Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room only, or... To personally survey the entire compartment?" {n}The eager officer looks clearly embarrassed by the absurdity of what he has just said.{/n}
"Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}

"Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ¿desea inspeccionar la sala de control, o... prefiere empezar a buscar el templo de la Red Sanguinolenta?». {n}Lo último te lo pregunta con una inquietud manifiesta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ¿desea inspeccionar la sala de control, o... prefiere empezar a buscar el templo de la Red Sanguinolenta?». {n}Lo último te lo pregunta con una inquietud manifiesta.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、管制室を視察されますか？それとも…ブラッドスパン・ウェブの神殿の捜索を始められますか？」{n}彼の言葉の後半は、明らかに心配そうなものだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、管制室を視察されますか？それとも…ブラッドスパン・ウェブの神殿の捜索を始められますか？」{n}彼の言葉の後半は、明らかに心配そうなものだった。{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人，您是打算检查控制室，还是……准备寻找织血罗网的圣殿？”{n}说出最后半句话的时候，他的声音里带着明显的关切。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您是打算检查控制室，还是……准备寻找织血罗网的圣殿？”{n}说出最后半句话的时候，他的声音里带着明显的关切。{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wollt Ihr den Kontrollraum inspizieren oder ... Euch auf die Suche nach dem Tempel des Blutgesponnenen Netzes machen?" {n}Er sagt den letzten Teil mit offensichtlicher Sorge.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, wollt Ihr den Kontrollraum inspizieren oder ... Euch auf die Suche nach dem Tempel des Blutgesponnenen Netzes machen?" {n}Er sagt den letzten Teil mit offensichtlicher Sorge.{/n}

languages.text: « Souhaitez-vous inspecter la salle de contrôle, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ou... préférez-vous partir à la recherche du temple de la Toile de Sang ? » {n}Il prononce ces derniers mots avec une inquiétude évidente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Souhaitez-vous inspecter la salle de contrôle, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, ou... préférez-vous partir à la recherche du temple de la Toile de Sang ? » {n}Il prononce ces derniers mots avec une inquiétude évidente.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, kontrol odasını incelemek mi istersiniz yoksa... Araştırmanıza Kanipi Ağı tapınağıyla mı başlamak istersiniz?" {n}Son cümleyi aşikâr bir endişeyle söylüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, would you like to inspect the control room or... to begin your search for the temple of the Bloodspun Web?" {n}He says the last part with obvious concern.{/n}
